body: Thanks for the info, considering he never tried to keep contacts with her during all these years, hoping to get her is selfish and arrogant, glad she found happiness by herself.

I guess yes and no. She's proly his CHF and went off somewhere to get married, and suddenly called him to visit someday. He went there, we're shown that he still have feelings, and at night, after going to the bathroom he witness that and oh well. It's not really in a literal sense since they weren't together to begin with, but it still formally is ntr since it has ntr elements and format aside from the fact that they are not in a relationship (although them not ending up together can be considered ntr to begin with I guess...)
So is this ntr or nah?
